title: Exploring Elementary Mathematics Concepts Using VR-Based Guided Navigation

context.prior_knowledge: Ability to comprehend basic mathematical concepts (geometry, spatial awareness, measurement)
context.additional_context: Environment enabling VR headset usage compatible with digital devices (tablets/smartphones)

learning_goals: Learners can identify 3D geometric components with 80% accuracy using guided navigation features in VR environments
Learners can improve spatial reasoning abilities by 25% compared to pre-assessments through VR-based interactive activities
Learners can explain at least three examples of applying mathematical concepts based on VR learning experiences in formative assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
